title: New pllayer
body:
Hi! Im Nismo from NA server.

Im a platinium player and I am playing since 2010.
I main top ( tryn main ).

Im here for Ocean week event!! 
Feel free to add me, I need friends :)

replies.body: Ohhhhhh k. I can be your friend >:)
No, I will try to rank on this server.
Are you just staying here for ocean week.
